title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Lists_of_One_Piece_episodes
transformers_text: One Piece is an anime television series based on the manga series of the same name As of November 2025 it has more than 1150 episodes The following list corresponds to the anime's 21 story arcs which are collected as seasons on Japanese home video and international releases On Fuji TV broadcasts One Piece airs continuously year round with regular preemption s in place for specials and sporting events not split into the standard Japanese television season cycles
